episode_summary: In this episode, tax attorney Hubert Johnson discusses how REALTORS can assist clients with tax liens and IRS issues to complete real estate transactions. He highlights the importance of setting up installment agreements and offers in compromise to resolve tax debts. Additionally, Hubert advises REALTORS on incorporating their business to protect personal assets from potential IRS liabilities.
